entry.title: Black Saturday
entry.content: The first day after the National Day is almost Black Saturday. So busy I am the all day! Thanks to the rain, I can’t ride a shared bike. Everything is so inconvenient.
entry.summary: The first day after the National Day is almost Black Saturday. So busy I am the all day! Thanks to the rain, I can’t ride a shared bike.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content:
